Articles.Content:
Let's get on straight to the issue. I'm using 32-bit KSP 0.25, Active Texture Management and Texture Replacer installed. My memory usage is VERY low. 2.5 Gigs/ 3.5 Gigs. Yes, I am on a 64-bit system and I have 4 gigs of ram. I have a LOT of mods installed, but ATM and TR keep things smooth and low memory usage.

Platform: Windows 8.1 Pro (All updates including optional updates are installed.)

Output_Log.txt (I don't have a player.log :/): https://www.dropbox.com/s/w14l37vc7g8cil8/output_log.txt?dl=1 (Direct output_log.txt download link)

The problems are:

Parts Categories are all messed up. I ended up finding the small gear bay not in the utility tab, in the aerodynamics tab, and I found propulsion parts in aerodynamic parts! Don't know what mod could cause this. Really.

Now, the second issue:

When I press S, the wings push me to the ground instead of going up. RCS controls work fine. Weird enough, in settings.cfg it says:

PITCH_UP

{

primary = S

secondary = None

group = 0

switchState = Any

}

... Now, my mods list.

Mods (Don't accurately know their versions, but I know they're all for 0.25, except Firespitter is for 0.24.2, I tried removing it, no issues fixed.):

Toolbar

Active Texture Management

B9 Aerospace (Official for 0.25)

Better Than Starting Manned

Crew Manifest

CrossFeed Enabler

Distant Object Visual Enhancement

Kerbal Engineer Redux

Enhanced Navball

Ferram Aerospace Research

Firespitter

SafeChute

Habitat Pack

Home V3

My mod (I tried removing it, didn't help fix my bugs.)

RasterPropMonitor

Kerbal Attachment System

Kerbal Flight Indicators

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

HyperEdit

Kethane

KineTech Animation

Klockheed Martian

KWRocketry

Magic Smoke Industries (Infernal Robotics)

MechJeb 2

NavHud

DockingPortAlignment

Open Resource System

RealChute

RemoteTech

ResGen

All Romfarer Mods

SmokeScreen

Station Science

TAC Fuel Balancer

Texture Replacer

TAC Life Support

Trajectories

TreeLoader

TriggerTech

TweakScale

VirginGeneric Plugin (???? Came from a mod)

VNG Parachutes

KSP Interstellar

Module Manager 1.5.1

And that's all! I hope somebody finds the cause of my issue

Edited October 26, 2014 by MetalBreaker
Please read the How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky.
I'm sorry, but I met those requirements, sir. Please read the whole post. In the issue description, it's stated how to reproduce it.
Read them again. You haven't included mod versions, your platform, or an output log. This is a case where screenshots would help, too.
Ugh, I'm sorry. I overreacted. I was kind of rude and angry to be honest. WIll list this, immediately.
That should be okay now. I can't really list the mod versions, I'm sorry, I don't have time. Looks like I won't get any support like this. At least I have listed my platform and output log.

I don't see anything obviously wrong that's related to your issues in the output log.

You could try a text search for "@category =" to look for Module Manager configs that are moving parts around. Now that I think about it, that could be a feature of BTSM.

Thank you so much! After a little bit of research, I removed BTSM; mixed up issue fixed. Moved my wings behind the CoM, control surfaces work perfectly. Love you! :3 (no homo)

-EDIT-

Do you know how do I make this thread [sOLVED] ?
This post in the Gameplay Questions forum is essentially the same, but for [unanswered] to [Answered].
Thank you again, Master Tao. Requesting thread lock.
